verses.1: Pasian aw, bang hangin kote hong paai khia paisuak na hi hiam? Bang hangin na gam sunga om nangma tuute tungah heh na hi hiam?
verses.2: Tanglai-in na ngah sa na mihonte, nangma luah minam dingin na tatkhiat sate phawk in! Na teennasa Zion Mual hong phawk in.
verses.3: A sia den sa munah hong pai in. Na biakinn sunga om khempeuh galte in susia khinta hi.
verses.4: Nangma galte mun siangtho laizang ah awng uh a, amauʼ dialte gualzawhna lim dingin a khai uh hi.
verses.5: Amaute pen tulak sing phatna ah pai-in heipi tawh sing a phuk bang uh hi.
verses.6: Tua ciangin biakinn na a kizemte khempeuh sek-hei le sekpi tawh a satkham uh hi.
verses.7: Amaute in mei tawh na biakinn hal uh a, nangmah hong kibiakna mun a susia uh hi.
verses.8: Amaute in, “A vekpi-in zo mang khin ni,” kici uh a, gam sungteng a om Pasian biakna inn khempeuh mei tawh a hal uh hi.
verses.9: Kote in ka mailam thu ding uh ka thei kei uh hi. Kamsang khat zong om nawn lo a, bang tanvei hi ding, ci-in a thei kuamah ka om kei uh hi.
verses.10: Pasian aw, ka galte in bang tanvei hong thusim loin om ding ahi hiam? Langpangte in nangma min hong simmawh den ding ahi uh hiam?
verses.11: Bang hangin na khut dokkik a, na khut taklam na ang ah koihcip na hi hiam?
verses.12: Ahi zongin Pasian pen tanglai pek a kipanin kumpi hi tawntung a, hih leitungah a hong hon khia zelzel ngei ka Kumpi ahi hi.
verses.13: Na vangliatna tawh tuipi na khenkham a, tuite tunga gulpiteʼ lutangte na sukham hi.
verses.14: Nangmah in Awleʼ lutangte na sukham a, amah pen, gamlak ganhingteʼ nek dingin na pia hi.
verses.15: Ciktuite le luite na phulsak a, gun tui luangte na kangsak hi.
verses.16: Sun pen nangma aʼ hi a, zan zong nangma aʼ mah ahi hi. Nangmah in ni le kha na bawl hi.
verses.17: Leitung gamgi khempeuhte le phalbi hun le khuakhal hunte na bawl khin hi.
verses.18: Topa aw, galte in nang hong thusim lohna le, dawibia mite in nangma min a hong simmawhna hong phawk ta in.
verses.19: A cimawh mite a gal gilote uh khut sungah nusia kei inla, bawlsiatna a thuak mite mangngilh kei in.
verses.20: Nangma thuciamna hong pi ngaihsut in; bang hang hiam cih leh leitung mun mialna khempeuh mi ngongtatte tawh kidim hi.
verses.21: A kisikcip mite zahhuaisak kei inla, mizawng le mi cimawhte nangma min kiphatsak in.
verses.22: Pasian aw, tho inla, nangma thu ah hong pang in. Dawibia mite in sun tawntungin nang a hong thusim lohna hong phawk ta in!
verses.23: Nangma galteʼ kikona aw, nang a hong langpangte a gamlum semsemna mangngilh kei ta in.
